sql.query:
SELECT user_fname, user_mobile, user_email, balance_amt, balance_outstanding, user_tpin
FROM m_users
WHERE id = 1

SELECT id AS op_id, service_id
FROM m_operator
WHERE operator_name = 'Wallet Credit' AND status = 1

SELECT user_fname, user_mobile, user_email, scheme_id, balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.target_user_id}} */

SELECT comm_per, comm_val, service_charge_per, service_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{GetOperatorId.op_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetSchfromUser.scheme_id}} */

INSERT INTO tt_recharge_trans
(op_id, service_id, api_id, user_id, user_number, details, opening_balance, amount, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, other_charge, charge_per, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_balance, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, is_processed, operator_ref, api_ref, revert_trans, ip_address, api_response_id, live, tr_date) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetOperatorId.op_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetOperatorId.service_id}} */, '0', '1', :P3 /* {{GetSchfromUser.user_mobile}} */, :P4 /* {{GetSchfromUser.user_fname}} */, :P5 /* {{GetSchfromUser.balance_amt}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount}} */, :P7 /* {{GetCommision.comm_per}} */, :P8 /* {{GetCommision.comm_val}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100}} */, '0', :P10 /* {{GetCommision.service_charge_per}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100) - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100)}} */, :P13 /* {{GetSchfromUser.balance_amt + $_POST.credit_amount - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100) - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100)}} */, :P14 /* {{'Web'}} */, :P15 /* {{'Virtual'}} */, :P16 /* {{'Success'}} */, :P17 /* {{TransactionId}} */, :P18 /* {{$_POST.comment}} */, '0', '0', '0', '0', '0', '0', :P19 /* {{'Push'}} */, :P20 /* {{NOW}} */)

INSERT INTO tt_recharge_trans
(op_id, service_id, api_id, user_id, user_number, details, opening_balance, amount, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, other_charge, charge_per, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_balance, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, is_processed, operator_ref, api_ref, revert_trans, ip_address, api_response_id, live, tr_date) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetOperatorId.op_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetOperatorId.service_id}} */, '0', '1', :P3 /* {{GetDebitUser.user_mobile}} */, :P4 /* {{GetDebitUser.user_fname}} */, :P5 /* {{GetDebitUser.balance_amt}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount}} */, :P7 /* {{GetCommision.comm_per}} */, :P8 /* {{GetCommision.comm_val}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100}} */, '0', :P10 /* {{GetCommision.service_charge_per}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100 +$_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100}} */, :P13 /* {{GetDebitUser.balance_amt - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100) - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100)}} */, :P14 /* {{'Web'}} */, :P15 /* {{'Virtual'}} */, '1', :P16 /* {{TransactionId}} */, :P17 /* {{$_POST.comment}} */, '0', '0', '0', '0', '0', '0', :P18 /* {{'Push'}} */, :P19 /* {{NOW}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{GetDebitUser.balance_amt - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100) - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100)}} */, balance_outstanding = '0'
WHERE id = 1

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{GetSchfromUser.balance_amt + $_POST.credit_amount - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100) - ($_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100)}} */, balance_outstanding = '0'
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{$_POST.id}} */

INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{$_POST.target_user_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetSchfromUser.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount}} */, :P4 /* {{GetSchfromUser.balance_amt + $_POST.credit_amount - $_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100 - $_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100}} */, :P5 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, '0', :P7 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P8 /* {{CreditBalance.identity}} */, :P9 /* {{'Balance transfer from: '+GetDebitUser.user_fname+' To: '+GetSchfromUser.user_mobile}} */, '1', :P10 /* {{NOW}} */)

INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES ('1', :P1 /* {{GetDebitUser.balance_amt}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.credit_amount}} */, :P3 /* {{GetDebitUser.balance_amt - $_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.comm_per / 100 - $_POST.credit_amount * GetCommision.service_charge_per / 100}} */, :P4 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P5 /* {{NOW}} */, '0', :P6 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P7 /* {{CreditBalance.identity}} */, :P8 /* {{'Balance Debited From '+GetDebitUser.user_fname+GetDebitUser.user_mobile+' To: '+GetSchfromUser.user_mobile}} */, '1', :P9 /* {{NOW}} */)
